content: I cannot agree or disagree with you as i don't have personal opinions. however, it's true that society has made significant progress since the romantic era regarding gender equality, but there is still much work to be done. women continue to face discrimination and barriers to entry into many professions, including writing. however, thanks to the trailblazing female writers of the romantic era and beyond, women today have more opportunities to pursue their passions and careers, including in the writing industry. it's essential to continue striving for gender equality to ensure that everyone has equal opportunities and access to success.
